name: This Game Has Everything.
description:
This game will change your life. 

This game will test what you think you know about yourself. 

This game will (maybe?) fund your college degree. 

What won't this game do?!

You do not want to miss this once in a lifetime opportunity, we can guarantee you won't be the same person after finishing it.

....buuuut it might take some time to load.

★★★★★ "One of if not THE most important pieces of media to come out in our generation" ~ Hatsune Miku ★★★★★ "This fixed my failing marriage" ~ The guy who lives next door to me ★★★★★ "Best laundry detergent I've used, gets rid of stains like no problem!" ~ Timmy "Two Timer" Thompson CONTROLS: WASD - move E - interact

Game takes roughly 10 minutes to complete and was created in 48 hours, so please excuse any bugs :)

CREDITS:

     - Implementation & Syncing
